plot: João, a playboy, spends his last day as a single in a resort hotel, where he seduces a teenager and gets involved with the casino singer.
title: Ovelha Negra, Uma Despedida de Solteiro
plot_es: João, a playboy, spends his last day as a single in a resort hotel, where he seduces a teenager and gets involved with the casino singer.
original_name: Ovelha Negra, Uma Despedida de Solteiro
plot_en: João, a playboy, spends his last day as a single in a resort hotel, where he seduces a teenager and gets involved with the casino singer.
